Items.Title: Oversight - Proposed federal cuts to the Community Services Block Grant (CSBG): How will New York City Be Affected?

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon Congress and the President to maintain federal funding of the Community Services Block Grant (CSBG) and to renew our nation’s commitment to combat poverty, ameliorate racial and ethnic inequality and empower low-income communities.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Maintain federal funding of the Community Services Block Grant (CSBG).
